#Text= Shiro Shinobi says : " The rookie Ferrets came from out of nowhere and have made it further than anyone expected this season .

column1: #Text=But tonight , they face their toughest test yet , folks .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " And they 're off !
#Text=The two teams waste no time trying to blast each other out of zone one !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Hasook is the first to feel the heat of the Tigerdillos !
#Text=He tries to return the favor , but they 're too fast for him , while Mako shows off his trademark " cool under fire " style !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Oooh , the Tigerdillos score with a walloping one - two combo !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Can their teammate hold on to their zone one territory ?
#Text=Guess not !
#Text=Mako 's over the line !
#Text=The Tigerdillos get the green light and advance into Ferret territory !
#Text=" Korra says : " Come on , Ferrets !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Looks like Hasook 's in trouble !
#Text=He 's in zone three teetering over the drink !
#Text=And Hasook takes a dip !
#Text=He 'll be back for round two !
#Text="
